EffectType.description: The type of effect to emit throughout this volume.

IsOnlyScreenSpace.description: Whether the effects should be in world-space (3D effects in the world), or only in screen-space (2D effects drawn on the screen).

EmitterCount.description: How many particle emitters there should be within this volume.

Priority.description: The priority of this volume. Higher-priority volumes take precedence.

ZOffset.description: How far within the volume (along the Z axis) the effects will be emitted?

Extra.value: Volumes which emit a given particle effect throughout themselves. Used for effects like fire sparks or snow floating through the air.
